Tints.name: Razzmatazz
positive: I crave the stickiness of desire.
negative: I need it on my skin...
I need them to paint on me!
I crave more to cover my skin.
Give me more to decorate with.
Tints.description: Because you love the warm embrace of cum on your skin you gain the tint of razzmatazz. You gain 50 max health, and having cum on your skin increases your confidence which increases your two-handed damage. If you haven't had cum on your skin in a day, you can no longer talk to people who do not produce cum.

Tints.name: Cupid
positive: Feeling your power course through my veins.
A river of desire flows through me.
Feeling so full of your passion.
Tints.description: You colour is cum-addiction cupid! If you embrace this color of your desire, you gain immunity to diseases and poisons. You also have increased max magicka based on how filled up you are. But if you have no cum inside you, you take double damage from ice and fire.

Tints.name: Lavenderblush
positive: Breaking trust, one partner at a time.
A secret only I can keep.
The more heartbroken, the happier I am.
The betrayal adds spice to our passion.
Making them suffer only heightens the experience.
My energy soars on the wings of a heartbreak.
Tints.description: You long for the destruction of trus, so your new tint is Lavenderblush! Having sex for the first time with a person in a marriage that does not involve you increases your XP gained by a lot. As this upsets her greatly, Mara forbids you from wearing her amulet.

Tints.name: Carnation
positive: Our kisses ignite a fiery passion.
This love story is the tale of our time.
Our love grows with each touch.
I am complete in your arms.
negative: Without romance, it's just an encounter.
My essence craves for true affection.
A missed chance to declare devotion.
Wishing for soft whispers of love.
Tints.description: You love love! So your color is carnation. As love conquers all, you gain increased damage against creatures incapable of love such as monsters, but you lose damage against humans if you haven't had a romantic interaction in a while.

Tints.name: Tosca
positive: Unbridled passion in its purest form.
Tints.description: You're gay, good for you! Your color is tosca, which triples xp from interactions with your gender, but halves it in other cases.

Tints.name: Blush
Tints.description: You love to the feel of arousal, you color is blush, on your face and your desire. You are permanently maximally aroused if you are not satiated. Friendly people who get you off, gain a strong buff to all their stats.

Tints.name: Lilac
Tints.description: COLOR. While you are collared, you halve the time between your barks and halve your effectiveness to intimidate people. If you take of your collar, you lose 50% energy and are sad for a day.

Tints.name: Pink
Tints.description: Your color is pink, like the inside of your body. You become exhibitionistic and gain 50 stamina. While you are top and bottomless you gain increased armor. But if you put on clothes again, your speed decreases.

Tints.name: Maroon
Tints.description: Maroon is the new black! You start each day with a new tattoo, these make you more intriguing, increasing your speech by 10.

Tints.name: PinkÂ²
Tints.description: Oh oh, you are now a bimbo! You can no longer become satiated, but you also can no longer fall below 0 energy. This color is so strong, it removes all of your other colors.

Tints.name: Crusta
Tints.description: Your color is crusta! Sneaking no longer costs energy, but you can only regain energy indoors or at night.

Tints.name: Sangria
Tints.description: You favourite color is sangria. You gain 20% ice resistance and when you consume alcohol, you gain 50 max stamina for a while. If you haven't had a drink in a while, you find something to drink which costs a lot more than usual.

Tints.name: Mystic
Tints.description: You love swalloing mystical things. Your potions and poisons are 10% stronger and while you are digesting cum or have eaten an ingredient or drank a potion recently, you increase your chance of picking an additional ingredient by 10%. Professional alchemists dislike you and charge you 20% worse prices.

Tints.name: Geraldine
Tints.description: Your ass is geraldine colored like from all that spanking! You have increased max health due to getting used to the pain. When you get your ass spanked, you learn faster for a while. If your ass is unspanked for to long, it makes a loud noise when you start sneaking.

Tints.name: Crimson
Tints.description: You are addicted to seeing your own crimson colored blood. You double the bonus max health from the body skill and add your base skill level on top. If you are above 200 current health, you take double damage from all sources. This penalty increases to triples or sextuples, if you haven't been below 200 health or spanked/bitten in a while.

Tints.name: Cerise
Tints.description: COLOR. You restoration skill increases 20% faster. They also cost twice as much. If you have been praised recently, they also heal twice as much.

Tints.name: Plum
Tints.description: You are bad with money like a plum. Selling prices are reduced to a quarter. This has made you more aware of the world around you, increasing your learning rate by 100%. If you recently had sex with a shopkeep, you reduce their prices by half of your seduction level.
